name: Wizard World
description:
Wizard World: Fighting Morvagor is an exciting adventure action game set in a fantastic world full of magic and danger. In this world, the evil Morvagor, a powerful demon from hell, has taken possession of the dinosaurs, using their powerful power to destroy the world and subdue it to themselves.

You play the role of a young wizard or witch who is the last hope for the world. Their task is to confront the powerful and dangerous dinosaurs who have been possessed by Morvagora. The player must acquire new skills, develop their magic and command a team of heroes to defeat each of the dinosaurs and Morvagora itself.

The game offers a variety of missions and tasks that lead the player through different regions of the wizarding world. He must explore mysterious forests, snow landscapes and many other locations, looking for the clues and artifacts needed to defeat Morvagor.

During the adventure, the player will be able to perfect their magical skills, acquire new spells and discover powerful artifacts that will help him in the battle. He will also be able to recruit companions to his team, such as other wizards, warriors who possess unique skills and can provide support in difficult situations.

Fights in the game are dynamic and exciting. The player will have to use their tactical skills and strategies to successfully defeat the possessed dinosaurs. He can use a combination of spells, blocks, escapes and special attacks to inflict as much damage as possible on his opponents.

As the game progresses, the plot develops and players discover the secrets of Morvagor and his plans. They must face not only his army of dinosaurs, but also other evil creatures from hell and the traps that await them on their way.
